instruction: Which species is the largest bird alive today?
output_1: Today, the ostrich stands as the largest bird extant, with the ability to reach nearly 11 feet (335 cm) in height and attain a weight up to 285 lbs (130 kg).
output_2: The contenders for the title of the largest bird living today are the common ostrich (Sylvia ostrich) or the elephant bird from Madagascar (Genus Aepyornis), which is extinct.

instruction: Come up with a 3-step recipe to roast vegetables.
output_1:
Heat the oven to 400°F in anticipation.

5. Serve hot and enhance the taste with your preferred sauce or dressing.
